title: Uzziah’s Strength and Pride
summary: Uzziah becomes king at 16 and prospers because he seeks the Lord. He builds strong defenses and develops agriculture. However, he grows proud and unlawfully enters the temple to burn incense, resulting in God striking him with leprosy.

faq.question: Why was Uzziah successful early in his reign?
faq.answer: Because he sought the Lord and received guidance from the prophet Zechariah.

faq.question: What was Uzziah’s downfall?
faq.answer: His pride led him to unlawfully enter the temple, and he was struck with leprosy.
